nodes.bodyText:
please add a short description
the value sysConfig.transform.enableMovement is a bit uncommon..is there a reason we have to prefix it with sysConfig.`?

=> i suggest you orientate on the sysconfig de.metas.ui.web.handlingunits.process.WEBUI_M_HU_Transform.AllowNewTUsWithInfiniteCapacity (AD_SysConfig_ID=541082), minus any typos it contains
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,55 @@
+-- 2020-09-11T07:12:08.498Z
